name: Neclaus' Quest
description:
The fabled orphan of Burzee is making a very special delivery this year.

Neclaus' Quest is a new video game for the Gameboy Color built using GB Studio. It is now playable in-browser! You can also download the ROM to play in your favorite emulator..

  • Deliver 5 unique gifts to special locations in a labyrinthine home
  • Learn the secrets of navigating the structure; you'll need it in order to get out!
  • Enjoy the work of talented artists from the libre gaming community
  • Have a happy holiday!

I've forever wanted to make a game based on my favorite holiday fairytales. I hope you enjoy it!
